title: The reactionComponent GET Response Schema
description: The schema for the GET response to retrieve an array of Reaction Components

data.$comment: This is where the data of the request is found, containing an array of all of the Reaction Components.
data.description: Each element is a Reaction Components object, the number of elements can range from 1, for a specific query, or all instances in the database.

type.$comment: The type of object the data will be returned.
type.description: The type of data being returned.
